name: Journey To The Highest Mountain
description:
Journey To The Highest Mountain is an interactive find-the-differences photographic collection taken by my family during our exploration of the marvelous natural environments that Italy has in its territory.
I am still in the process of sorting the photos and modifying them, but in the meantime you can enjoy the first few levels and kindly leave some feedback with the form below.

https://goo.gl/forms/nt24WIbMsEOBweLk1

Thank you for playing!
